institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 18-3 (Cancellation of joint training center selection, restriction of support, etc.)
contents: Article 18-3 (Cancellation of selection of joint training center and restriction of support, etc.) ① Detailed standards for cancellation of selection and restriction of support, etc. pursuant to Article 12 of the Regulations shall be in accordance with Annex 5, “Detailed standards for cancellation of selection of joint training center and restriction of support, etc.” . ② In the case of a joint training center with limited support, the requirements of the chairman must be faithfully implemented, such as establishing a business plan in consideration of dispositions pursuant to vocational education and training-related laws such as the 「National Lifelong Vocational Skills Development Act」. Revised on June 28, 2022, ③ If a joint training center operates a business in violation of regulations and procedures, the Corporation may take measures such as a warning. Detailed standards are listed in Appendix 5, “Cancellation of selection of joint training center.” and detailed standards for support restrictions, etc.”
